trans-unit.source: Creates a transformation specified by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>, used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] world space.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en omvandling som anges av en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>, som används för att manipulera objekt eller koordinatsystem i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] world utrymme.

trans-unit.source: Use the MatrixTransform3D class to create custom transformations that are not provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> class.
trans-unit.target: Använd klassen MatrixTransform3D för att skapa anpassade transformeringar som inte tillhandahålls av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>klass</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>

trans-unit.source: You can combine <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> objects by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kombinera <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>objekt med hjälp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A Matrix3D that specifies the transform.
trans-unit.target: En Matrix3D som anger transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref>, and makes deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ändringsbar kloning av detta <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"> </xref>, och gör djup kopior av värden för det här objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: När du kopierar beroendeegenskaper kopierar resurs referenser och data Bindningar (även om de inte längre kan lösa) men inte kopiera animeringar eller deras aktuella värden.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden används för att skapa ändringsbar kopior av fryst <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekt eller för någon <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden skuggar ärvda version med strikt typkontroll implementering för enkelhetens skull.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En ändringsbar kloning av det aktuella objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonade objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> även om källans <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ändringsbar kloning av detta <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"> </xref> objekt och gör djup kopior av det här objektets aktuella värden.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Resursreferenser, databindningar och animeringar kopieras inte, men deras aktuella värden finns.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden används för att skapa ändringsbar kopior av fryst <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekt eller för någon <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden skuggar ärvda version med strikt typkontroll implementering för enkelhetens skull.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En ändringsbar kloning av det aktuella objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonade objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> även om källans <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transform is affine.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om transformeringen är något.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transform is affine; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om transformeringen är något; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> som anger en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] omvandling.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A Matrix3D that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: En Matrix3D som anger en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] omvandling.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets a matrix representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en matris-representation av den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] omvandling.

trans-unit.source: The Value property inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value ärver från en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>klass.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>

trans-unit.source: The Value property enables you to convert any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> object into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value kan du konvertera alla <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>objekt i en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> class is defined by using a Matrix3D, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> and Value properties always return the same value.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom den <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform>klass definieras med hjälp av en Matrix3D den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A>och värdeegenskaper returnerar alltid samma värde.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform>

trans-unit.source: The MatrixTransform3D class exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> property to enable write access.
trans-unit.target: MatrixTransform3D klassen visar den <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>egenskapen till skrivbehörighet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transformation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> representation av den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] omvandling.
